title: At the winter sea ice camp. Pt. 2
creator_credit: Quentin Brown, Kevin Smith, Education Development Center and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Part of a series on the Netsilik Inuit as documented by the Education Development Center. This film show life at the campsite. Children amuse themselves with makeshift toys. Women tend their children, make clothes, and repair the igloos. When the men return with their catch, everyone goes inside where work, story-telling and games occupy each one’s time. Award: Parno. Suitable for upper primary level.
